itunes:title: JUL 18, 2022 - TRIAL OF STEVE BANNON BEGINS TODAY
title: JUL 18, 2022 - TRIAL OF STEVE BANNON BEGINS TODAY
description:
Former Donald Trump Chief Strategist Steve Bannon starts his trial TODAY for defying the January 6th Committee’s political show trials. Poso reviews the Uvalde School Shooting report that discloses nearly 400 local, state, and federal officers and agents waited outside while the shooting was taking place. Dr. Deborah Birx admitted to hiding data when recommending Covid-19 strategies to former President Donald Trump in order to get lockdowns as soon as possible. Black Lives Matter (BLM) are under attack after raising tens of thousands of dollars for the ‘unjustified death’ of a man at the hands of police after he opened fire on an apartment complex. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.itargetpro.com to get 10% off and free shipping with offer code POSO
